sentences.sContent: How do you choose your toothbrush?
sentences.sCn: 你是如何选择你的牙刷的？

sentences.sContent: Do not bring flowers on your first date: bring your toothbrush and your cat.
sentences.sContent_eng: Do not bring flowers on your first date: bring your toothbrush and your cat.
sentences.sCn: 第一次约会的时候不要带鲜花，请带上你的牙刷和你的猫。

sentences.sContent: All of these strategies will get you a toothbrush, but none gets you the best one for the job.
sentences.sContent_eng: All of these strategies will get you a toothbrush, but none gets you the best one for the job.
sentences.sCn: 所以得这些策略都可以帮助你得到个牙刷，但他们都不能帮你得到最佳的那个。

trans.tranOther: a small brush that you use for cleaning your teeth
